participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and sentimental, she enjoys spending time with her pets and has a soft spot for heartfelt music.
participant_1.background: I lie to my children about eating healthy. I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day. I have two dogs, one pitbull and one Old English Bulldog. I learned piano at age 6. I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and expressive, he thrives on performance and connection, though he has some personal struggles.
participant_2.background: I'm excited to see my girlfriend after my long run. I listen to folk music. I enjoy performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others. I'm allergic to bees. My children are a disappointment.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a big fan of folk music. What's your favorite folk song?
Oh hey there, I'm glad to meet another folk music fan! My favorite song is probably "Wayfaring Stranger", though it changes from time to time. What about you?
Oh that's a good one! I like "The House of the Rising Sun" a lot. It's so sad and beautiful.
Me too! I love how it builds and builds, and the lyrics are so haunting.
I love how it's been covered by so many different artists over the years. It always has a different feel, depending on who's singing it.
That's what I love about folk music! It's so versatile and can be interpreted in so many different ways.
Yeah, it's really the perfect genre for expressing oneself.
I'm glad you agree! Do you play any instruments?
I play piano, but I'm not very good at it.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
It's a lot of fun! But it's also really hard.
I'm sure I'd get the hang of it eventually.
